trans-unit.source: A reference to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> that contains properties that define the appearance of instruction text.
trans-unit.target: 对 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> 的引用，它包含用于定义说明文本外观的属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.InstructionTextStyle%2A> property defines the appearance of instruction text in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.InstructionTextStyle%2A>属性定义中的说明文本的外观<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>控件。

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object that it returns.
trans-unit.target: 此属性是只读的;但是，可以设置的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>它将返回的对象。

trans-unit.source: You can set these properties declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` represents a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> class (for example, `InstructionTextStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 你可以在窗体中以声明方式设置这些属性`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`表示的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>类 (例如， `InstructionTextStyle-ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: You can set the property programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `InstructionTextStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 你可以以编程方式设置此属性的形式`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `InstructionTextStyle.ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.InstructionTextStyle%2A> property defines the appearance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.InstructionText%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.InstructionTextStyle%2A>属性定义的外观<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.InstructionText%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The style settings for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.InstructionTextStyle%2A> property are merged with the style settings for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control.
trans-unit.target: 样式设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.InstructionTextStyle%2A>属性合并的样式设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>控件。

trans-unit.source: Any settings applied in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.InstructionTextStyle%2A> property override the corresponding settings in properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control.
trans-unit.target: 在应用任何设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.InstructionTextStyle%2A>属性重写的属性中的相应设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>控件。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> style properties are overridden by <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.InstructionTextStyle%2A> settings:
trans-unit.target: 以下<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>样式属性重写了<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.InstructionTextStyle%2A>设置：

trans-unit.source: However, when you use templates to define the appearance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.InstructionTextStyle%2A> property has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 但是，当你使用模板可以定义的外观<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>控件，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.InstructionTextStyle%2A>属性不起作用。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the message displayed when the password retrieval answer is not valid.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置密码恢复答案无效时所显示的消息。

trans-unit.source: The message displayed when the password retrieval answer is not valid.
trans-unit.target: 密码恢复答案无效时所显示的消息。

trans-unit.source: The default is "Please enter a different security answer."
trans-unit.target: 默认值为“请另输入一个安全答案。”

trans-unit.source: The default text for the control is localized based on the server's current locale.
trans-unit.target: 控件的默认文本根据服务器当前的区域设置进行本地化。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership> class membership provider specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MembershipProvider%2A> property can support a question and answer for retrieving or resetting the user's password.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership>中指定的类成员资格提供程序<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MembershipProvider%2A>属性可以支持问题和答案检索或重置用户的密码。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.InvalidAnswerErrorMessage%2A> property is displayed when the answer entered by the user does not meet the requirements for the answer set by the membership provider.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.InvalidAnswerErrorMessage%2A>用户输入的应答不符合答案设置成员资格提供程序的要求时，将显示属性。

trans-unit.source: The actual requirements for the answer are determined by the membership provider, and might be different for different providers.
trans-unit.target: 答案的实际要求由成员资格提供程序，因此对于不同的提供程序可能会不同。

trans-unit.source: An object that represents the control state to restore.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示要还原的控件状态的对象。

trans-unit.source: Restores view-state information from a previous page request that was saved by the SaveViewState method.
trans-unit.target: 从用 SaveViewState 方法保存的上一个页面请求还原视图状态信息。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="savedState" /> is not a valid <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="savedState" /> 不是有效的 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to log in the new user after creating the user account.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在创建用户帐户后是否登录新用户。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the new user should be logged in after creating the user account; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果在创建用户帐户后应登录新用户，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.LoginCreatedUser%2A> property can be set to `false` if you want to create a user account but not authenticate the account after it is created.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.LoginCreatedUser%2A>属性可以设置为`false`如果你想要创建用户帐户身份验证，但该帐户将在创建后。

trans-unit.source: This might be useful if you are an administrator creating user accounts, for example, or if there is a waiting period before users can access the Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如果你是管理员创建用户帐户，例如，或如果没有用户可以访问 Web 站点之前的等待期，这可能很有用。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.LoginCreatedUser%2A> property is set to `true`, the user will be created and logged in at the end of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CreateUserStep%2A> step.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.LoginCreatedUser%2A>属性设置为`true`，将创建用户，并且将其登录的末尾<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CreateUserStep%2A>步骤。

trans-unit.source: If you want the user to be logged in after all the steps have been completed, you can set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.DisableCreatedUser%2A> property to `false` until all of the steps of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control are completed.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想让用户登录完成所有步骤后，你可以设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.DisableCreatedUser%2A>属性`false`直至将所有的步骤<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>都完成控制。

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to a collection of properties that define the characteristics of the email message sent to new users.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个对属性集合的引用，这些属性用于定义发送给新用户的电子邮件的特征。

trans-unit.source: A reference to a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition" /> object that defines the email message sent to a new user.
trans-unit.target: 对引用<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition" />对象，用于定义电子邮件发送给新用户。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MailDefinition%2A> property returns a reference to a group of properties that you use to define the format and content of the email message that is sent to new users.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MailDefinition%2A>属性返回对一组属性，用于定义的格式和内容发送给新用户的电子邮件消息的引用。

trans-unit.source: Common settings include the subject line and the sender's return address.
trans-unit.target: 常用的设置包括的主题行和发件人的寄信人地址。

trans-unit.source: For a complete list of properties, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition> class.
trans-unit.target: 属性的完整列表，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition>类。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MailDefinition%2A> property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition> object it returns.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MailDefinition%2A>属性是只读的; 但是，可以设置的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition>对象返回。

trans-unit.source: You can set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MailDefinition%2A> properties declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` represents a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition> class (for example, `MailDefinition-Subject`).
trans-unit.target: 你可以设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MailDefinition%2A>属性以声明方式在窗体`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`表示的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition>类 (例如， `MailDefinition-Subject`)。

trans-unit.source: You can also set the properties programmatically in the form `Property.SubProperty` (for example, `MailDefinition.Subject`).
trans-unit.target: 你还可以设置属性以编程方式在窗体中`Property.SubProperty`(例如， `MailDefinition.Subject`)。

trans-unit.source: An email message is sent to new users only if <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition> is not `null` and if <xref:System.Web.Mail.MailMessage.Body%2A> is not empty or `null`.
trans-unit.target: 电子邮件发送到新的用户才<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition>不`null`如果<xref:System.Web.Mail.MailMessage.Body%2A>不为空或`null`。

trans-unit.source: In that case, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.SendingMail> event is raised and an attempt is made to send the email message.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.SendingMail>引发事件并尝试发送电子邮件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition.From%2A> property must be set to an email address.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition.From%2A>属性必须设置为电子邮件地址。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, an <xref:System.Web.HttpException> exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 否则为<xref:System.Web.HttpException>引发异常。

trans-unit.source: When the email message is created from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition> object, it will make the substitutions listed in the following table.
trans-unit.target: 当从创建电子邮件时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition>对象，它将使以下表中列出的替换。

trans-unit.source: Substitution text
trans-unit.target: 替换文本

trans-unit.source: Replaced with
trans-unit.target: 替换为

trans-unit.source: The user name of the newly created user account.
trans-unit.target: 新创建的用户帐户的用户名称。

trans-unit.source: The password for the newly created user account.
trans-unit.target: 新创建的用户帐户的密码。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition.IsBodyHtml%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition> object is `true`, the contents of the mail message will be HTML encoded to guard against cross-site scripting security vulnerabilities for the message recipient.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition.IsBodyHtml%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition>对象是`true`，对电子邮件的内容将 HTML 编码的消息接收方防止跨站点脚本的安全漏洞。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.OnSendingMail%2A> method to modify the <xref:System.Web.Mail.MailMessage> created by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition> object.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.OnSendingMail%2A>方法可以修改<xref:System.Web.Mail.MailMessage>由<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition>对象。

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。

trans-unit.source: It is not possible to guarantee that a user will receive or view an email message.
trans-unit.target: 不能保证用户将接收或查看电子邮件。

trans-unit.source: To verify that a user has received a notification by email, consider providing a confirmation link in the email message that enables the user to confirm that the notification was received.
trans-unit.target: 若要验证的用户已通过电子邮件中收到通知，请考虑提供使用户能够确认通知已收到电子邮件消息中的确认链接。

trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例设置的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MailDefinition%2A>通过声明性和编程语法的属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the membership provider called to create user accounts.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置为创建用户帐户而调用的成员资格提供程序。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider" /> used to create user accounts.
trans-unit.target: 用于创建用户帐户的 <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MembershipProvider%2A> property contains the name of the defined <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider> class membership provider that is used to store the user information.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MembershipProvider%2A>属性包含的定义名称<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider>用于存储用户信息的类成员资格提供程序。

trans-unit.source: You can store membership information for users in different data stores by changing the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MembershipProvider%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 你可以通过更改的值在不同的数据存储中存储的用户成员资格信息<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MembershipProvider%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MembershipProvider%2A> property is set to <xref:System.String.Empty>, the default membership provider defined in the Web.config file is used.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MembershipProvider%2A>属性设置为<xref:System.String.Empty>，使用 Web.config 文件中定义的默认成员资格提供程序。

trans-unit.source: Membership providers are defined in the Web.config file in the `<membership>` section.
trans-unit.target: 在 Web.config 文件中定义成员资格提供程序`<membership>`部分。

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.ContinueButtonClick> event is raised when the user clicks the **Continue** button on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.ContinueButtonClick>用户单击时引发事件**继续**按钮上<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.OnContinueButtonClick%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.OnContinueButtonClick%2A> 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.OnContinueButtonClick(System.EventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.OnContinueButtonClick(System.EventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 在派生类中重写 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.OnContinueButtonClick(System.EventArgs)" /> 时，一定要调用基类的 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.OnContinueButtonClick(System.EventArgs)" /> 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.OnCreatedUser%2A>成员资格提供程序创建的网站用户帐户后调用方法。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.LoginCreatedUser%2A> property is `true`, the user is logged in after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.OnCreatedUser%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.LoginCreatedUser%2A>属性是`true`，用户登录后<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.OnCreatedUser%2A>调用方法。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.OnCreatedUser%2A> method to set Web site values, such as personalization properties, before the user is logged in for the first time.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CreateUserError" /> event when there is a problem creating the specified user account.
trans-unit.target: 在创建指定的用户帐户过程中出现问题时将引发 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CreateUserError" /> 事件。

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.OnCreateUserError%2A>中指定的成员资格提供程序时，调用方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MembershipProvider%2A>属性从创建指定的用户帐户返回一条错误消息。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserErrorEventArgs.CreateUserError%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserErrorEventArgs> object passed as the `e` parameter contains a <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipCreateStatus> object that contains the details of the error.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CreatingUser" /> event prior to calling the membership provider to create the new user account.
trans-unit.target: 在调用成员资格提供程序以创建新用户帐户前将引发 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CreatingUser" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.OnCreatingUser%2A> method to do any processing required before sending the new user information to the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A> method of the membership provider specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MembershipProvider%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.OnCreatingUser%2A>方法来执行操作在发送到的新用户信息之前所需的任何处理<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A>方法中指定的成员资格提供程序<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MembershipProvider%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: For example, you might set the user name field to all lowercase letters, or compare the email address to a list of restricted addresses before allowing creation of the user account.
trans-unit.target: 例如，你可能会将用户名字段设置为所有小写字母，或在允许的用户帐户创建之前比较列表的受限制的地址的电子邮件地址。

trans-unit.source: If you need to cancel the request to create the new user account, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginCancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginCancelEventArgs> object passed as the `e` parameter to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果你需要取消请求，以创建新的用户帐户，将设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginCancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginCancelEventArgs>对象作为传递`e`参数`true`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example defines a custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control that uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.OnCreatingUser%2A> method to make the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.UserName%2A> property all lowercase.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例定义一个自定义<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>使用控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.OnCreatingUser%2A>方法来执行<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.UserName%2A>属性全部采用小写形式。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates a Web page that uses the `CustomCreateUserWizard`.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示一个网页，使用`CustomCreateUserWizard`。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.OnCreatingUser(System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginCancelEventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class’s <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.OnCreatingUser(System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginCancelEventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 在重写<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.OnCreatingUser(System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginCancelEventArgs)" />在派生类中，一定要调用基类的<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.OnCreatingUser(System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginCancelEventArgs)" />方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardNavigationEventArgs" /> containing the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件数据的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardNavigationEventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.NextButtonClick" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引发 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.NextButtonClick" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> object that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件数据的 <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引发 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: The membership provider for the page cannot be found.
trans-unit.target: 找不到页面的成员资格提供程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <see cref="P:System.Web.Security.Membership.Providers" />.
trans-unit.target: 有关详情，请参阅<see cref="P:System.Web.Security.Membership.Providers" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailMessageEventArgs" /> containing the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件数据的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailMessageEventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.SendingMail" /> event before an email message is sent to a new user.
trans-unit.target: 向新用户发送电子邮件前引发 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.SendingMail" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.OnSendingMail%2A> method to modify the email message sent to new users.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.OnSendingMail%2A>方法可以修改发送到新用户的电子邮件消息。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailMessageEventArgs.Message%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailMessageEventArgs> object passed as the `e` parameter contains the <xref:System.Web.Mail.MailMessage> object that will be sent to the new user.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailMessageEventArgs.Message%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailMessageEventArgs>对象作为传递`e`参数包含<xref:System.Web.Mail.MailMessage>将发送给新用户的对象。

trans-unit.source: Modify the properties of the <xref:System.Web.Mail.MailMessage> object to modify the email message.
trans-unit.target: 修改的属性<xref:System.Web.Mail.MailMessage>对象以修改电子邮件。

trans-unit.source: Email messages are only created when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition.BodyFileName%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MailDefinition%2A> object specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MailDefinition%2A> property points to a valid file name.
trans-unit.target: 时，才会创建电子邮件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition.BodyFileName%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MailDefinition%2A>指定对象<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MailDefinition%2A>属性指向有效的文件名。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.OnSendingMail%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.OnSendingMail%2A> 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。

trans-unit.source: The following code example defines a custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control that uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.OnSendingMail%2A> method to modify the text of the email sent to new users.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例定义一个自定义<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>使用控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.OnSendingMail%2A>方法来修改的发送给新用户的电子邮件文本。

trans-unit.source: This example requires a text file named MailFile.txt that contains the following text.
trans-unit.target: 此示例需要一个名为包含以下文本的 MailFile.txt 文本文件。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.OnSendingMail(System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailMessageEventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class’s <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.OnSendingMail(System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailMessageEventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 在重写<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.OnSendingMail(System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailMessageEventArgs)" />在派生类中，一定要调用基类的<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.OnSendingMail(System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailMessageEventArgs)" />方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventArgs" /> containing the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件数据的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.SendMailError" /> event when email cannot be sent to the new user.
trans-unit.target: 当无法向新用户发送电子邮件时引发 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.SendMailError" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.OnSendMailError%2A> method is called when the SMTP mail system raises an exception while attempting to send email to the new user.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.OnSendMailError%2A> SMTP 邮件系统引发尝试向新用户发送电子邮件时出现异常时调用方法。

trans-unit.source: Examine the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventArgs.Exception%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventArgs> object passed as the `e` parameter to determine the actual cause of the exception.
trans-unit.target: 检查<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventArgs.Exception%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventArgs>对象作为传递`e`参数，以确定异常的实际原因。

trans-unit.source: The most common problem is a configuration error in the `<smtpMail>` section of the Web.config file.
trans-unit.target: 最常见的问题是存在配置错误`<smtpMail>`Web.config 文件的部分。

trans-unit.source: You must set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventArgs.Handled%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventArgs> object passed as the `e` parameter to signal that the exception that caused the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.OnSendMailError%2A> method to be called has been taken care of, otherwise the exception is re-thrown.
trans-unit.target: 必须设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventArgs.Handled%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventArgs>对象作为传递`e`发出信号，异常导致参数<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.OnSendMailError%2A>方法调用已被处理的否则例外情况是重新引发。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.OnSendMailError%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.OnSendMailError%2A> 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。

trans-unit.source: The following code example defines a custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> object that logs email errors to a site-specific logging function.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例定义一个自定义<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>对象日志电子邮件将错误记录到特定于站点的日志记录函数。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates a Web page that uses the `CustomCreateUserWizard`.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示一个网页，使用`CustomCreateUserWizard`。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.OnSendMailError(System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class’s <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.OnSendMailError(System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 在重写<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.OnSendMailError(System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventArgs)" />在派生类中，一定要调用基类的<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.OnSendMailError(System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventArgs)" />方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

trans-unit.source: Gets the password entered by the user.
trans-unit.target: 获取用户输入的密码。

trans-unit.source: The password entered by the user.
trans-unit.target: 用户输入的密码。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空字符串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.Password%2A> property contains the password entered by the user.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.Password%2A>属性包含用户输入的密码。

trans-unit.source: By default, a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompareValidator> object is provided for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.Password%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.ConfirmPassword%2A> text box values.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompareValidator>对象提供有关<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.Password%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.ConfirmPassword%2A>文本框值。

trans-unit.source: Each text box displayed on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control also has a <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.RequiredFieldValidator> object associated with it.
trans-unit.target: 显示在每个文本框中<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>控件还具有<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.RequiredFieldValidator>对象与之关联。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to a collection of properties that define the appearance of the text that describes password requirements.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个对属性集合的引用，这些属性用于定义描述密码要求的文本的外观。

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> that contains properties that define the appearance of the text that describes password requirements.
trans-unit.target: 对 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> 的引用，它包含一些属性，这些属性用于定义描述密码要求的文本的外观。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.PasswordHintStyle%2A> property defines the appearance of the text that describes password requirements in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.PasswordHintStyle%2A>属性定义的描述中的密码要求的文本的外观<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>控件。

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object that it returns.
trans-unit.target: 此属性是只读的;但是，可以设置的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>它将返回的对象。

trans-unit.source: You can set these properties declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` represents a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> class (for example, `PasswordHintStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 你可以在窗体中以声明方式设置这些属性`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`表示的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>类 (例如， `PasswordHintStyle-ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: You can set the property programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `PasswordHintStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 你可以以编程方式设置此属性的形式`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `PasswordHintStyle.ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.PasswordHintStyle%2A> property defines the appearance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.PasswordHintText%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.PasswordHintStyle%2A>属性定义的外观<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.PasswordHintText%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The style settings for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.PasswordHintStyle%2A> property are merged with the style settings for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control.
trans-unit.target: 样式设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.PasswordHintStyle%2A>属性合并的样式设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>控件。

trans-unit.source: Any settings applied in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.PasswordHintStyle%2A> property override the corresponding settings in properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control.
trans-unit.target: 在应用任何设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.PasswordHintStyle%2A>属性重写的属性中的相应设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>控件。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> style properties are overridden by <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.PasswordHintStyle%2A> settings:
trans-unit.target: 以下<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>样式属性重写了<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.PasswordHintStyle%2A>设置：

trans-unit.source: However, when you use templates to define the appearance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.PasswordHintStyle%2A> property has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 但是，当你使用模板可以定义的外观<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>控件，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.PasswordHintStyle%2A>属性不起作用。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text that describes password requirements.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置描述密码要求的文本。

trans-unit.source: The text that describes password requirements.
trans-unit.target: 描述密码要求的文本。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空字符串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.PasswordHintText%2A> property to provide guidelines and requirements for the user on how to create a password.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.PasswordHintText%2A>属性来提供有关如何创建密码的指导原则和用户的要求。

trans-unit.source: For example, you could set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.PasswordHintText%2A> property to "Your password must be at least six characters long."
trans-unit.target: 例如，你可以设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.PasswordHintText%2A>属性设置为"你的密码必须至少为六个字符。"

trans-unit.source: You can then use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.PasswordRegularExpression%2A> property to validate that the user entered a password that conforms to the guidelines.
trans-unit.target: 然后，可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.PasswordRegularExpression%2A>属性可以验证用户输入的密码是否符合这些准则。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值设置时，可以自动保存到的资源文件通过使用设计器工具。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>和[全球化和本地化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text of the label for the password text box.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置密码文本框的标签文本。

trans-unit.source: The text of the label for the password text box.
trans-unit.target: 密码文本框的标签文本。

trans-unit.source: The default value is "Password:".
trans-unit.target: 默认值为“密码：”。

trans-unit.source: The default text for the control is localized based on the server's current locale.
trans-unit.target: 控件的默认文本根据服务器当前的区域设置进行本地化。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值设置时，可以自动保存到的资源文件通过使用设计器工具。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>和[全球化和本地化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a regular expression used to validate the provided password.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于验证提供的密码的正则表达式。

trans-unit.source: A string containing the regular expression used to validate the provided password.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，该字符串包含用于验证提供的密码的正则表达式。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空字符串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.PasswordRegularExpression%2A> property to define the requirements for passwords used to validate users on your Web site.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.PasswordRegularExpression%2A>属性来定义用于验证您的网站上的用户的密码要求。

trans-unit.source: A common use is to make sure that a user has included symbols other than letters in a password to make it harder for attackers to guess a password.
trans-unit.target: 一个常见用途是确保用户具有密码以使其猜出密码的攻击者更难中包含非字母符号。

trans-unit.source: The regular expression is used in addition to any restrictions placed on the password by the membership provider specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MembershipProvider%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 上的密码任何约束中指定的成员资格提供程序之外，还使用正则表达式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MembershipProvider%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: If the membership provider rejects the password for any reason, the text contained in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.InvalidPasswordErrorMessage%2A> property is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 如果成员资格提供程序拒绝密码出于任何原因中, 所包含的文本<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.InvalidPasswordErrorMessage%2A>属性显示。

trans-unit.source: If the password entered does not pass the regular expression, the error message contained in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.PasswordRegularExpressionErrorMessage%2A> property is displayed to the user.
trans-unit.target: 如果输入的密码未通过正则表达式，错误消息包含在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.PasswordRegularExpressionErrorMessage%2A>向用户显示属性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.PasswordRegularExpression%2A> property to define a regular expression that checks passwords to ensure that they:
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.PasswordRegularExpression%2A>属性来定义正则表达式，用于检查密码以确保它们：

trans-unit.source: Are longer than seven characters.
trans-unit.target: 多于 7 个字符。

trans-unit.source: Contain at least one digit.
trans-unit.target: 包含至少一个数字。

trans-unit.source: Contain at least one special (non-alphanumeric) character.
trans-unit.target: 包含至少一个特殊的 （非字母数字） 字符。

trans-unit.source: If the password entered by the user does not meet these criteria, the text contained in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.PasswordRegularExpressionErrorMessage%2A> property is displayed to the user.
trans-unit.target: 如果用户输入的密码不满足这些条件，文本将包含在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.PasswordRegularExpressionErrorMessage%2A>向用户显示属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the error message shown when the password entered does not conform to the site's password requirements.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置当输入的密码不符合站点的密码要求时所显示的错误消息。

trans-unit.source: The error message shown when the password entered does not pass the regular expression defined in the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.PasswordRegularExpression" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 当输入的密码没有通过 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.PasswordRegularExpression" /> 属性中定义的正则表达式时所显示的错误消息。

trans-unit.source: The default is "Please enter a different password."
trans-unit.target: 默认值为“请另输入一个密码。”

trans-unit.source: The default text for the control is localized based on the server's current locale.
trans-unit.target: 控件的默认文本根据服务器当前的区域设置进行本地化。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.PasswordRegularExpressionErrorMessage%2A> property to inform the user that the password entered did not conform to the site's password requirements.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.PasswordRegularExpressionErrorMessage%2A>属性以通知用户输入的密码不符合该站点的密码要求。

trans-unit.source: The following code example sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.PasswordRequiredErrorMessage%2A> property to explain to the user that the password entered does not meet the requirements of the regular expression contained in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.PasswordRegularExpression%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.PasswordRequiredErrorMessage%2A>属性向输入的密码不符合要求的正则表达式中包含的用户说明<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.PasswordRegularExpression%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: To pass the regular expression, passwords must:
trans-unit.target: 若要将传递正则表达式，密码必须：

trans-unit.source: Be longer than six characters.
trans-unit.target: 能长于六个字符。

trans-unit.source: Contain at least one digit.
trans-unit.target: 包含至少一个数字。

trans-unit.source: Contain at least one special (non-alphanumeric) character.
trans-unit.target: 包含至少一个特殊的 （非字母数字） 字符。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text of the error message shown when the user does not enter a password.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置由于用户未输入密码而显示的错误消息的文本。

trans-unit.source: The error message shown when the user does not enter a password.
trans-unit.target: 由于用户未输入密码而显示的错误消息。

trans-unit.source: The default value is "Password is required."
trans-unit.target: 默认值为“必须填写‘密码’。”

trans-unit.source: The default text for the control is localized based on the server's current locale.
trans-unit.target: 控件的默认文本根据服务器当前的区域设置进行本地化。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the password recovery confirmation question entered by the user.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用户输入的密码恢复确认问题。

trans-unit.source: The password recovery confirmation question entered by the user.
trans-unit.target: 用户输入的密码恢复确认问题。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空字符串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: The membership provider specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MembershipProvider%2A> property will determine whether the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.Question%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.Answer%2A> text boxes are displayed at run time.
trans-unit.target: 在指定的成员资格提供程序<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MembershipProvider%2A>属性将确定是否<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.Question%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.Answer%2A>文本框显示在运行时。

trans-unit.source: Each text box displayed on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control has a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RequiredFieldValidator> associated with it.
trans-unit.target: 显示在每个文本框中<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>控件具有<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RequiredFieldValidator>与之关联。

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值设置时，可以自动保存到的资源文件通过使用设计器工具。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>和[全球化和本地化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example modifies the email message in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.SendingMail> event to include the user's password recovery confirmation question in the message sent to new users.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例修改中的电子邮件消息<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.SendingMail>要包含在发送到新用户的消息中的用户的密码恢复确认问题的事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the user is required to enter a password confirmation question and answer.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示用户是否必须输入密码确认问题和答案。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the user is required to enter a password confirmation question and answer; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果用户必须输入密码确认问题和答案，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.QuestionAndAnswerRequired%2A> property returns a value from the membership provider set in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MembershipProvider%2A> property specifying whether the user is required to enter a password confirmation question and answer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.QuestionAndAnswerRequired%2A>属性从设置的成员资格提供程序返回一个值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MembershipProvider%2A>属性指定是否要求用户输入密码确认问题和答案。

trans-unit.source: If a Membership provider requires a question and answer, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.Question%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.Answer%2A> controls are required and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> throws an exception if they are not found or of the wrong type.
trans-unit.target: 如果成员资格提供程序需要问题和答案，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.Question%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.Answer%2A>控件为必选和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>引发异常，如果未找到或错误的类型。

trans-unit.source: If they are not required by the Membership provider, no exception is thrown if they are not found, and if they are of the wrong type they are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果成员资格提供程序不需要它们，如果未找到，并且如果它们的类型不正确它们将被忽略，是不引发任何异常。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text of the label for the question text box.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置问题文本框的标签文本。

trans-unit.source: The text of the label for the question text box.
trans-unit.target: 问题文本框的标签文本。

trans-unit.source: The default value is "Security Question:".
trans-unit.target: 默认值为“安全提示问题：”。

trans-unit.source: The default text for the control is localized based on the server's current locale.
trans-unit.target: 控件的默认文本根据服务器当前的区域设置进行本地化。

trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>和[全球化和本地化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the error message that is displayed when the user does not enter a password confirmation question.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置由于用户未输入密码确认问题而显示的错误消息。

trans-unit.source: The error message that is displayed when the user does not enter a password confirmation question.
trans-unit.target: 由于用户未输入密码确认问题而显示的错误消息。

trans-unit.source: The default value is "Security question is required."
trans-unit.target: 默认值为“必须填写‘安全提示问题’。”

trans-unit.source: The default text for the control is localized based on the server's current locale.
trans-unit.target: 控件的默认文本根据服务器当前的区域设置进行本地化。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值设置时，可以自动保存到的资源文件通过使用设计器工具。

trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>和[全球化和本地化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether an email address is required for the Web site user.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示网站用户是否必须填写电子邮件地址。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if an email address is required; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 如果的电子邮件地址是必需的;否则为<see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.RequireEmail%2A> property is `true`, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> will display a text box and an associated label for the user to enter an email address.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.RequireEmail%2A>属性是`true`、<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>将显示一个文本框和一个关联的标签的用户输入的电子邮件地址。

trans-unit.source: If the user does not enter an email address, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.EmailRequiredErrorMessage%2A> property will display an error message.
trans-unit.target: 如果用户未输入电子邮件地址，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.EmailRequiredErrorMessage%2A>属性将显示一条错误消息。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.RequireEmail%2A> property is set to `true` and you are using templated content, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.Email%2A> control is required and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> throws an exception if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.Email%2A> control is not found or is of the wrong type.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.RequireEmail%2A>属性设置为`true`且正在使用模板化的内容，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.Email%2A>需要进行控制和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>时引发异常<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.Email%2A>控件找不到或属于错误的类型。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.RequireEmail%2A> is set to `false`, no exception is thrown if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.Email%2A> is not found.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.RequireEmail%2A>设置为`false`，在引发任何异常<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.Email%2A>找不到。

trans-unit.source: If it is of the wrong type, it is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果它是错误的类型，则忽略它。

trans-unit.source: If the membership provider specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MembershipProvider%2A> property requires a unique email address for new users, you must set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.RequireEmail%2A> property to `true` so that the UI for entering an email address is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 如果成员资格提供程序中指定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MembershipProvider%2A>属性需要新用户的唯一的电子邮件地址，则必须设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.RequireEmail%2A>属性`true`以便显示用于输入电子邮件地址的用户界面。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the user will see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.EmailRequiredErrorMessage%2A> but have no way to enter an email address.
trans-unit.target: 否则，用户将看到<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.EmailRequiredErrorMessage%2A>但没有任何办法输入电子邮件地址。

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。

trans-unit.source: Saves any state that was modified after the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.TrackViewState" /> method was invoked.
trans-unit.target: 保存调用 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.TrackViewState" /> 方法后修改的任何状态。

trans-unit.source: An object that contains the current view state of the control; otherwise, if there is no view state associated with the control, <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个包含该控件的当前视图状态的对象；如果没有与该控件关联的视图状态，则为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Occurs before the user is sent an email confirmation that an account has been created.
trans-unit.target: 在向用户发送用于确认帐户已创建的电子邮件前发生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> class will send an email message confirming that a new Web site account has been created when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MailDefinition%2A> property defines an email message to send.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>类将发送电子邮件确认，新网站创建帐户时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MailDefinition%2A>属性定义的电子邮件发送。

trans-unit.source: Because the email message only has automatic replacement fields for the user name and password fields, you can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.SendingMail> event to modify the email message before it is sent to the new user.
trans-unit.target: 由于电子邮件中只有自动替换为用户名和密码字段的字段，你可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.SendingMail>事件发送到新的用户之前修改电子邮件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.SendingMail> event to modify the email message that is sent to new users.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.SendingMail>事件来修改发送给新用户的电子邮件。

trans-unit.source: This example requires a text file named MailFile.txt that contains the following text.
trans-unit.target: 此示例需要一个名为包含以下文本的 MailFile.txt 文本文件。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when there is an SMTP error sending email to the new user.
trans-unit.target: 在向新用户发送电子邮件的过程中出现 SMTP 错误时发生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.SendMailError> event is raised when there is a problem using the SMTP mail provider to send email to the email address provided by the new user.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.SendMailError>使用 SMTP 邮件提供商向新用户提供的电子邮件地址发送电子邮件问题时引发事件。

trans-unit.source: The most common reason to raise this event is when the `<smtpMail>` section of the Web.config file is incorrect.
trans-unit.target: 引发此事件的最常见原因是当`<smtpMail>`Web.config 文件的部分不正确。

trans-unit.source: The default <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.SendMailError> event handler does not catch or handle the SMTP error from the email system.
trans-unit.target: 默认值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.SendMailError>事件处理程序不会捕捉或处理电子邮件系统中的 SMTP 错误。

trans-unit.source: Your <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.SendMailError> event handler must set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventArgs.Handled%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventArgs> object to `true` in order to stop the error from appearing to the Web site user.
trans-unit.target: 你<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.SendMailError>事件处理程序必须设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventArgs.Handled%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventArgs>对象传递给`true`若要停止中显示给网站用户的错误。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example is a handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.SendMailError> event that calls a site-specific procedure to log the email error.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例是处理程序<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.SendMailError>调用特定于站点的过程来记录电子邮件错误的事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventArgs.Handled%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventArgs> object is set to `true` to indicate that the error has been handled.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventArgs.Handled%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventArgs>对象设置为`true`以指示已处理错误。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" /> containing the design-time data for the control.
trans-unit.target: 包含控件的设计时数据的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" />。

trans-unit.source: Sets design-time data for a control.
trans-unit.target: 为控件设置设计时数据。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that is used to render alternate text that notifies screen readers to skip the sidebar area's content.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，它用于呈现替换文字，以通知屏幕阅读器跳过侧栏区域的内容。

trans-unit.source: A string that the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard" /> renders as alternate text with an invisible image, as a hint to screen readers.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard" /> 将其呈现为不可见图像的替换文本，作为对屏幕阅读器的提示。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空字符串("")。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.SkipLinkText%2A> property to specify the alternate text for a hidden-image read by screen readers that will provide the ability to skip the sidebar area's content.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.SkipLinkText%2A>将提供跳过侧栏区域的内容的功能的屏幕读取器读取的属性来指定隐藏图像的替换文字。

trans-unit.source: The text that you specify provides assistive technology devices with a description of the hidden image that can be used to make the control more accessible.
trans-unit.target: 你指定的文本提供了可用于使控件更易于访问的隐藏图像的说明的辅助技术设备。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.DisplaySideBar%2A> property is set to `false` (the default), the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.SkipLinkText%2A> property does not create a hidden image with alternate text.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.DisplaySideBar%2A>属性设置为`false`（默认值）、<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.SkipLinkText%2A>属性不会创建的隐藏的图像的替换文字。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.SkipLinkText%2A> property works only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.DisplaySideBar%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.SkipLinkText%2A>属性时才起作用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.DisplaySideBar%2A>属性是`true`。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to a collection of properties that define the appearance of text box controls.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个对属性集合的引用，这些属性用于定义文本框控件的外观。

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" /> that contains properties that define the appearance of text box controls.
trans-unit.target: 对 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" /> 的引用，它包含用于定义文本框控件外观的属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.TextBoxStyle%2A> property defines the appearance of text box controls in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.TextBoxStyle%2A>属性定义中的文本框控件的外观<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>控件。

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> object that it returns.
trans-unit.target: 此属性是只读的;但是，可以设置的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>它将返回的对象。

trans-unit.source: You can set these properties declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` represents a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> class (for example, `TextBoxStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 你可以在窗体中以声明方式设置这些属性`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`表示的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>类 (例如， `TextBoxStyle-ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: You can set the property programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `TextBoxStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 你可以以编程方式设置此属性的形式`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `TextBoxStyle.ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.TextBoxStyle%2A> property defines the appearance of the following text box controls:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.TextBoxStyle%2A>属性定义的以下文本的控件的外观：

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.UserName%2A> text box field
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.UserName%2A> 文本框字段

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.Password%2A> text box field
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.Password%2A> 文本框字段

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.ConfirmPassword%2A> text box field
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.ConfirmPassword%2A> 文本框字段

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.Question%2A> text box field
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.Question%2A> 文本框字段

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.Answer%2A> text box field
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.Answer%2A> 文本框字段

trans-unit.source: The style settings for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.TextBoxStyle%2A> property are merged with the style settings for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control.
trans-unit.target: 样式设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.TextBoxStyle%2A>属性合并的样式设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>控件。

trans-unit.source: Any settings applied in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.TextBoxStyle%2A> property override the corresponding settings in properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control.
trans-unit.target: 在应用任何设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.TextBoxStyle%2A>属性重写的属性中的相应设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>控件。

trans-unit.target: 以下<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>样式属性重写了<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.TextBoxStyle%2A>设置：

trans-unit.target: 但是，当你使用模板可以定义的外观<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>控件，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.TextBoxStyle%2A>属性不起作用。

trans-unit.source: Marks the starting point to begin tracking changes to the control as part of the control viewstate.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the error message displayed when an error returned by the membership provider is not defined.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置当成员资格提供程序返回未定义的错误时所显示的错误消息。

trans-unit.source: The error message displayed when an error returned by the membership provider is not defined.
trans-unit.target: 当成员资格提供程序返回未定义的错误时所显示的错误消息。

trans-unit.source: The default value is "Your account was not created.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为“未创建您的帐户。

trans-unit.source: Please try again."
trans-unit.target: 请重试。”

trans-unit.source: The default text of the control is localized based on the server's current locale.
trans-unit.target: 控件的默认文本根据服务器当前的区域设置进行本地化。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值设置时，可以自动保存到的资源文件通过使用设计器工具。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d).

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the user name entered by the user.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用户输入的用户名。

trans-unit.source: The user name entered by the user.
trans-unit.target: 用户输入的用户名。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空字符串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: If a user name is required by the membership provider specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MembershipProvider%2A> property, then the user name text box will appear on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control.
trans-unit.target: 如果在指定的成员资格提供程序需要的用户名称<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MembershipProvider%2A>属性，则用户名称文本框中将出现在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>控件。

trans-unit.source: Each text box displayed on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control has a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RequiredFieldValidator> object associated with it.
trans-unit.target: 显示在每个文本框中<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>控件具有<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RequiredFieldValidator>对象与之关联。

trans-unit.source: The following code example sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.UserName%2A> property to all lowercase alphabetical characters in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CreatingUser> event.

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to a collection containing all the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase" /> objects defined for the control.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个对集合的引用，该集合包含为控件定义的所有 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection" /> representing all the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase" /> objects defined for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection" />，表示为 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase" /> 控件定义的所有 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.WizardSteps%2A> property returns a collection of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase> objects that make up the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.WizardSteps%2A>属性返回的集合<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>组成对象<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>控件。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.WizardSteps%2A> collection to programmatically access the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase> objects contained in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.Add%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.Remove%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.Clear%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.Insert%2A> methods to programmatically manipulate the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase> objects in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.Add%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.Remove%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.Clear%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.Insert%2A>方法以编程方式操作<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>集合中的对象。
